pmtmsg-badaccess-group0: That action is not allowed.
pmtmsg-blocked-notice-logextract: This user has been blocked.
pmtmsg-blockedtext:
$7 has been blocked by $1 at $8. (#$5)
Reason: $2
Expiration: $6
IP address: $3
pmtmsg-cascadeprotected:
This page has been protected.
This page is transcluded in the following cascade-protected {{PLURAL:$1|page|pages}}:
$2
pmtmsg-cascadeprotectedwarning:
You are editing a protected page.
This page is transcluded in the following cascade-protected {{PLURAL:$1|page|pages}}:
pmtmsg-editinginterface: You are editing a page in [[Special:AllPages/MediaWiki:|{{ns:Mediawiki}}]] namespace.
pmtmsg-excontentauthor: Content was "$1", and only edited by [[User:$2|$2]]
pmtmsg-moveddeleted-notice: This page has been moved or deleted.
pmtmsg-moveddeleted-notice-recent: This page was moved or deleted within the last 24 hours.
pmtmsg-namespaceprotected:
[[Special:AllPages/$1:|$1]] namespace has been protected.
[[Special:ListGroupRights#Namespace restrictions|View namespace restrictions]]
pmtmsg-newarticletext: You are creating a new page.
pmtmsg-noarticletext:
This page does not exist.
[{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=edit}} Create this page]
pmtmsg-noarticletext-nopermission:
This page does not exist.
You do not have permission to create this page.
pmtmsg-nocreate-loggedin: You cannot create new pages.
pmtmsg-nocreatetext: You must [[Special:UserLogin|log in]] to create new pages.
pmtmsg-permissionserrorstext: You do not have permission to do that.
pmtmsg-permissionserrorstext-withaction: You do not have permission to $2.
pmtmsg-protect-unchain-permissions: Apply different protection setting for each action
pmtmsg-protectedinterface:
[[Special:AllPages/MediaWiki:|{{ns:Mediawiki}}]] namespace has been protected.
[[Special:ListGroupRights#Namespace restrictions|View namespace restrictions]]
pmtmsg-protectedpagemovewarning: You are moving a protected page.
pmtmsg-protectedpagetext:
This page has been protected.
Protection level: {{int:restriction-level-$1}}
[{{fullurl:Special:Log/protect|page={{FULLPAGENAME}}}} View protection log]
pmtmsg-protectedpagewarning: You are editing a protected page.
pmtmsg-recreate-moveddeleted-warn: You are recreating a page that was previously moved or deleted.
pmtmsg-sp-contributions-blocked-notice: This user has been blocked.
pmtmsg-sp-contributions-blocked-notice-a: This IP address has been blocked.
pmtmsg-titleprotectedwarning: You are creating a protected page.
pmt-template-cc0:
This file is licensed under the [https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/deed.en Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal] license.
Check its [https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/deed.en summary] and [https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode full text].
pmt-template-cclicense:
This file is licensed under the [$3deed.en Creative Commons {{int:pmt-license-cc-{{lc:$1}}}} {{int:pmt-license-cc-$2}}] license.
Check its [$3deed.en summary] and [$3legalcode full text].
pmt-template-unsigned: Another user added signature to [[User:$1|$1]]'s unsigned message.
pmt-template-usergroup:
This user is a(n) [[{{int:grouppage-$1}}|{{int:group-$1-member}}]].
You can verify it on [[Special:UserRights/{{ROOTPAGENAME}}|User rights]] page.
